text: Penny Spencer (born 1 January 1948) is a British actress, best remembered for her performance as coquettish schoolgirl Sharon Eversleigh in the LWT television comedy series Please Sir! (1968–70). She appeared in the pilot episode - "Identified" - of Gerry Anderson's live-action series UFO in 1970. She also appeared in films such as The Whisperers (1967), Under the Doctor (1976) and The Playbirds (1978). ==Acting roles== *Georgy Girl (1966) - Kate (uncredited) *The Whisperers (1967) - Mavis Noonan *Countdown to Danger (1967) - Sue *Please Sir!
